choices: Hide near the socks and shoes
1.content:
Your name is John and you just got home from your summer job. You are 19 yrs old and your parents leave at you home to watch your brat sister and her friends.
"Amanda, I'm home!" There's no answer so you decide to see if everything is alright. You step into Amanda's room to see bowls of popcorn, half eaten pizzas, and cans of soda everywhere. "God her and her friends are such pigs..." You think to yourself. Suddenly you feel dizzy, fall to the floor and pass out. When you come to, you stand up and realize everything is bigger,,,,,,Much bigger. You look around your surroundings and you figure you are about 1 inch tall in your sister's room. You start to panic as you start to her your sister and her friends coming back. You decide to,,,
1.title: Little Sister's Big Room

11.content:
You stand there in disbelief as your giant sister and her friends come running into the room.
"You girls still hungry?" Amanda says as she opens up a bag of Doritos. Carly has already found more pizza and has begun stuffing her mouth full of it. Not surprisingly, nobody has noticed you yet while Carly stands right above you. You try to avoid the huge crumbs of food falling from high above when you realize Carly is sitting down. She plops down with a crashing thud nearly on top of you! You try to run away but see the crotch of her panties, as you turn the other way, you see it is blocked off by her massive legs.
"ugh huftu pur" she tries to get out of her mouth full of pizza. You look up and see her cute and small face bulge with food with a smile.
"What did you say" Julie says as she sits down adjacent to her.
"BUUUUUURRRRP, I said I have to burp" Carly said, giggling with Amanda. You can literally feel the vibration of the burp from the floor and gaze on as your sister's friend laughs. Brianna comes into view and says to the group, "Shh! The movie's starting" Carly smiles and gets up to join the other 3 near the foot of the bed. This is your chance to escape, but then you realize that this room is the safest place to be, almost forgetting that no one else is home. You decide that it would be best to at least try to get their attention... or at least see how long this shrinking thing wears off. Not wanting to reaaally get captured by these giants you figure to wait it out before actually attempting to get their attention. So in the mean time you go over to see what movie it is so you get closer and you realize its Titanic. Your sister loves this movie but you hate it, you figured it always was too drawn out and was way too sappy for your tastes, but you decide to stay and watch, knowing you really couldn't do much else. You walk over to the bed and are about to get comfortable, while avoiding contact with your sister and her friends, when a shadow appears over you. You look up to see...
11.title: Stay in the open

111.content: You look up in time to see your brat of a sister about to step on you. You don't know if she has seen you but you don't really think you want to stick around and wait to find out. Thinking fast you decide to..
111.title: Amanda!

choices: She sees your squished body pressed to her foot
You aren't there -- you're stuck in the carpet and alive!
You are on your sister's foot, but not crushed
1111.content:
You didn't think fast enough! Amanda's gigantic foot slams down on your tiny body, and in less than an instant you feel soft and crushing flesh covering your entire being. Her sole pushes you deep into the carpet. It's such a large mass that you barely notice the scent; your nose is only tuned to such a small amout of foot. Lucky you...even though you're probably going to be crushed anyway and that's probably a more pressing fear.

"Eww! I think I stepped on a bug." Amanda comments, piquing the attention of her friends. She lifts her huge foot off the floor and takes a look at the sole for signs (or remains) of what had come between it and the floor.
1111.title: Think too long (Stomped)

1112.content: You leap into the air, just barely avoiding your sister's giant bare foot. Before you can think what to do, you look up and see Amanda sitting down. Her bright pink sweatpants with the word 'cute' on the butt come straight for you. The weight of her presses you into the carpet, but other than being uncomfortable you seem to be okay. The sound of the girls is muffled, but you can hear the sound of a movie starting. You try to wiggle to get your sister attention, but you can't move at all. You just wait. Next...
1112.title: Amanda's Butt

choices: No your still pinned under her
11122.content: After about 15 minutes you really start to become impatient and begin to squirm again trying to free yourself and you think that your efforts are paying off,Amanda begins to lean to her side. But your excitement is cut short when you start to hear her stomach "GROAN" loudly you start to hear it travel down lower inside her body."OH GOD" she's going to fart you Scream! You begin to squirm frantically trying to break free. Dose it work....
11122.title: She farts

choices: It's silent and stinks even more!
111222.content: No it doesn't work. Your foot got caught under the cheek she was leaning on. You know you won't escape so you hold your breath and hope for the best.
111222.title: No your still pinned under her

1112222.title: It's silent and stinks even more!

11122221.content:
You get blasted into the carpet by a silent hot wave. You feel sunburned are you? But that's not what concerns you. It's the smell that's devastating. Imagine a land fill that's full of rotten eggs. Add that scent of doritos and that's a fraction of what it smells like. You want to throw up but you hold it back so you don't get noticed. You can taste the doritos she had. But it's mixed with shit.

"EW!" Carly shouts as she jumps up sniffing the air. "Brianna put your shoes on, your feet stinks!" How could Carly think that was the scent of feet? Amanda bursts out laughing saying "that was me Carly. I tooted and it I can tell you think it tastes delicious." Carly backed away. You could hear her making gagging noises. Then she throws up. You can't smell it though because the fart is too concentrated on your nose. Julie is laughing because with her blocked nose she can't smell it. Brianna has her nose covered by her sleeping bag. Carly starts crying from the smell. "Oh my god Amanda, what did you eat? I've never smelt anything as bad as this". Unknown to Carly, Amanda slipped one a small bit of pizza down her pants when she farted. She says to Carly "look, I'm really sorry, okay? How about you have my pizza?" Carly couldn't turn down pizza. She smiled and took it. She took a bite and you saw her face go green from under Amandas ass. She has nothing to throw up anymore so she screams. "Oh my God, Oh my God! What is wrong with this?" "I farted on it because I knew you loved the taste." Carly sat down silently. And stared at floor. Amanda says "I actually think I sharted there now. Something solid is beneath me" you know she's talking about you so when she stands up you...
11122221.title: It's roasting

choices: In a bag of gummy bears
The mouth of Carly' or Brianna's sleeping bag
1113.content:
By dastardly

You sprint down the corridor between two sleeping bags at full speed. Gargantuan bodies are shifting on either side of you, with with huge legs and knees cropping out over the edges of the bags and looming on top of you. Gasping, you look over your shoulder and see your sister's foot swooping in for another lumbering step toward you. She swings her ponderous ankle carefully, trying to step in the spaces between her friends.

As soon as you turn back around, Carly's foot slides off of her bag and roars across the rug beside you. You somehow navigate alongside the back of her foot and run toward the middle of the rug, where all the girl's heads are facing. Towering snacks piles cast shadows on the grounf and the sky is blackened with huge potato chip and pieces of candy.

You spin around desperately at all the huge heads around you. Your sister's three friends are all huddled in a half-circle on their sleeping bags in their shirts and underwear, bending their feet behind them and kicking their bare feet in the air while their faces light up with the blue glare of the flickering TV.

Carly and Julie lie scrunched together, their massive mouths chewing endlessly as their long fingers carry one chip or pretzel after another to them. Amanda flops out on her knees next to Julie and slides on her stomach to put her hand inside the cheese puff bag. The earth rumbles loudly the second her belly button smacks her sleeping bag, and a massive quake nearly makes you fall over fromt he impact of her arms and knees collasping their weight on the ground. She twirls her long hair over her shoulder and starts stuffing her face with cheese puffs. Carly is arching her back out of her sleepign bag and resting her elbows on the rug. There's a deep opening between her elbows and the sleepign bag that looks like a cavenr right next to you.

The blare sound of three of their teeth chewing is deafening, even compared to the blare of the TV. All you see are giant mouths chewing up and down and surrounding you. Crumbs rain down everywhere from the girls' cheese-covered faces.

Then, out of nowhere, Brianna's pudgy hand falls from the heavens and smacks the huge pile of mini-snickers lying next to you. Candy squares fly from the impact, and you have to blindly leap and roll out of the way to miss the deadly avalanche. When you come to, you're inside--
1113.title: Jump out of the way 2

11131.content: Who's lovely hand did you end up in?
11131.title: In someone's hand

choices: Julie messily shoves the snacks in -- you fall out of her hand
Julie sneezes, and her handful flies everywhere
111311.content:
You come to after dodging that avalanche just in time to notice that you're laying on a bed of chips and pretzels, a good heaping handful of snacks picked out by your worst enemy in Amanda's group of friends: Julie. This pre-teen for whatever reason absolutely hates you, and would make a habit of enjoying your misery any chance that she could. You can't count the times you've been kicked, punched, insulted, and annoyed by this evil girl. Plus, she'd always steal your soda whenever left unattended. It's like she's addicted to the stuff or something.

And yet, as you slowly ascend on a bed of junk food towards her mouth, she just looked like any cute eleven-year-old, watching a movie with her friends. Strange how the cruelest of people can basically become a completely different person around the right people.

A nice reality check for you: you stare ahead blankly and notice Julie's giant mouth gape wide open to receive her haul. Little strands of saliva stretch and break as her mouth expands to reveal her awaiting and salivating tongue, and the entrance to a tunnel of darkness, lying just beyond her uvula. Suddenly, your blank gaze turns to a frightened spasm, as her hot, snack and soda-scented breath courses over your ever-approaching tiny body.
111311.title: The Cruel "Hand" of Fate

choices: Julie swallows -- the deadly journey continues
1113112.content:
Should've stayed alert. Julie's hand, messy eater that she is, manages to get all the big pieces of snack inside her impatient maw. Yes, in this situation, you count as big. Go figure.

You land with a wet plop onto Julie's gigantic, undulating tongue. Instantly, you can feel your body getting stuck in the pre-teen's viscous, sticky saliva, and watch in horror as once whole and perfectly shaped chips and pretzels get mashed and crunched to bits all around you. Luckily, "watch" is all you have to do, as you avoid a painful meeting between Julie's teeth. Once the hungry girl is finished chewing, however, you have become drenched in saliva and bound to a mushy, starchy mass; the pre-digestion of snack food.

It would take a large amount of force to get you un-stuck from this shackling intent on taking you into the worst of all chambers: Julie's stomach.
1113112.title: Julie's mouth welcomes you

choices: Your pleas fall on deaf ears...
11131121.content:
The slimy tongue flicks Julie's mushy meal -- and you with it -- backward into the darkness of her esophagus, and you are easily swallowed whole and alive with a powerful gulp. On the outside, Julie feels something odd about that last bite of food going down her throat, but shrugs it off and continues snacking.

You and the chewed-up food slide effortless down the tight, wet gullet of your sister's friend before being deposited through a tight sphincter and landing with a splash in the hot, moist depths of Julie's belly. The walls are pulsating, and a nearby green lake bubbles with acid -- all in an effort to break its meal down.

That includes you.

In a panic, you run over to the nearest rubbery wall of Julie's stomach and pound repeatedly on it, yelling for help all the while. But are you heard from within the preteen girl? Is freedom yours?
11131121.title: Down you go!

111311211.content:
As the girls continue snacking, they suddenly hear tiny, annoying noises. Kinda like screaming.

"Did you hear something?" Amanda asks.

"Doubt it," Julie responds surprisingly quickly.

"I could've sworn I heard a scream...it sounded like my brother's voice."

As she moves farther from Julie, Amanda notices the screams become fainter, but they seem louder when she goes near Julie...she finds that the noises are coming from behind the skin of the girl's belly!

"Julie..." Amanda begins to ask, "...did you eat my brother?"

"I dunno," Julie answers, "did I?"

Another yell and a soft growl from Julie's gut make the answer clear.

"Julie...you swallowed my brother! That's..."
111311211.title: Did you hear something?

choices: Have a burping contest with me!
I dare ya to eat everything in sight!
1113112112.content:
"That's awesome!" Amanda exclaims with glee, listening to the gurgling of Julie's belly. "Stupid boy must've found his way into our food! Well, now he is the food, haha. Probably the best use of him anyway."

Julie has no problem playing along if Amanda's okay with it. "Sweet, I hope my stomach takes its time with him!"

"Yeah!" Amanda high-fives Julie, then thinks of something new. "Hey, since you've got him for a while, what if you made his time inside you even worse?"

Julie's eyes light up at the idea.
1113112112.title: Fresh Torture Awaits

choices: Julie starts to feel sick...is freedom yours?
11131121122.content:
"I dare ya to eat everything in sight!" Amanda challenges Julie. "Well...everything you can fit in your mouth, anyway."

"Challenge accepted!" Julie smiles, almost deviously.

Your preteen captor proceeds to greedily munch on potato chips, pizza, and any other food she can get her hands on. Barely chewing each bite, Julie eagerly swallows mouthful after mouthful just to see what sort of torment it subjects her little plaything to.

In the depths of her stomach, your struggles come to a grinding halt as Julie's snacking spree buries you in masticated food. It only takes a few minutes for your prison to become rather cramped, leaving you without much breathable air. The shortage of oxygen is starting to exhaust your brain...
11131121122.title: OK, so she's not eating EVERYthing...

111311211221.content:
On the outside, Julie suddenly hears a groan of discomfort from her belly, and puts a hand to it. Apparently the little bug isn't agreeing with her system.

"Ugh..." Julie complains. "Maybe burying John in food wasn't my best idea."

"Uh, Julie..." Amanda chimes in, "...that was MY idea."

"Whatever."

Your prison gurgles and churns all around you, possibly in pain. Trying to heave your way out from under your captor's meal, you are quickly tossed about when the stomach starts to turn.

Could Julie be preparing to throw up? Will freedom be yours at last?
111311211221.title: Hope in the Most Acidic of Places

choices: You make progress, while the other girls notice what's going on
1113112112212.content:
"Ughhhhh..." Julie flops down on her back, laying down to try and ease the pain. She lifts up her shirt, revealing the pale rounded surface of her full belly.

Ashley giggles and begins to rub Julie's groaning belly. She can feel lumps of hastily-chewed food gurgling and moving about inside the preteen's packed stomach. There's no chance she'll feel you out of all of this, especially since with every deafening churn, you're tossed all over the place.

"Hey John!" Amanda teased, calling your name to Julie's tummy, "How's it going in there?"

You're a little busy, so Julie offers a response on your behalf:

*BUUUUUUUUURRP*

Both girls start laughing while you continue to fight against this crushing pile of masticated snacks.
1113112112212.title: Julie keeps her lunch down

choices: Ten minutes later and you're unrecognizable.
11131121122122.content:
You try as hard as you can, but the onslaught of junk food Julie ate completely buries your puny body. A loud gurgle squeezes everything together, and you are nearly crushed by barely-chewed bits of...perhaps potato chips? Sharp bits jab into you, but it seems to all be coated in mozzarella slop, definitely from being mixed up into the slices of pizza that the preteen devoured earlier, on top of the mouthfuls from just now.

You can't even scream because you don't really have any air to waste, not to mention there's hardly any space for you to open your mouth that wide without choking on half-digested food. There's really no hope left for you dude.

*grrrrrggll* *BLOOOORP*

"You think he's dead yet?" Amanda giggles as she feels her friend's bloated belly noisily shift its contents around.

"I mean," Julie begins, *UUUUUUUUUUUUURPPP* "Does that smell like a place where food survives?" Julie burps at Amanda, sending the aroma of mixing junk food at her.

"...Remind me not to be eaten by you!" The girls start laughing harder.
11131121122122.title: Just Another Snack

choices: Nope, you’ve moved on to the afterlife.
111311211221221.content:
Ten minutes after your consumption by Julie, your tiny body is uttely unrecognizable in the giantess’s gurgling stomach, what with potato chips and pizza giving you an improper burial. Thankfully, you’ve been given the mercy of losing consciousness long before the gastric juices started to eat away at your skin.

On the outside, Julie pats her belly a few times as it gurgles in triumph.

“Finally, the little guy stopped fighting...” Julie smirks. “Probably for the best, anyway.”

Are you even around to hear the girls discuss your fate?
111311211221221.title: Victory for Julie

1113112112212211.content:
"Bye John!" Your sister gleefully sends you off, "Hope you like becoming a part of Julie!"

*BUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRP* Julie lets out a big victory burp in response.

Who knew little girls could be so cruel...and eat so much?

Doesn't matter much anyway, does it? You are digested mush in Julie's gurgling full belly.
1113112112212211.title: Nope, you’ve moved on to the afterlife.

choices: Yes, but will she try to help you out?
1113112112212212.content:
Slowly you awaken to the familiar sight of the same room the girls are occupying. The main difference here is that you can’t move or even feel your limbs! Odd. But you do feel someone’s hand patting you, and the sensation is indescribably bizarre. How could you have survived being digested by Julie..?

Then it all clicks - your body has indeed been dissolved in Julie’s stomach, and your consciousness is now trapped in the preteen girl’s abs! Making an effort to move around, all you can manage are tiny, weak goosebump-like sensations in the skin of Julie’s belly.

She’s sure to notice something, right?
1113112112212212.title: Fat on Julie’s Abs

11131121122122121.content:
“HELP!!” you scream at the top of your nonexistent lungs, desperate to be noticed by the girls. What did you have left to lose at this point?

Julie stops patting her slightly-exposed stomach, herself and her friends swearing they’d heard John’s voice. But didn’t she...y’know, eat him?

“Julie, it’s me, John!” you yell again, though your voice sounds somewhat muffled to the girls. “I’m trapped as part of your abs now...let me out of here!”

Julie stares at her belly for a moment before giving it an abrupt slap, sending a brief surge of pain through you. “Sorry, little guy! You’re staying in there. And I think I’ll treat you to a...”
11131121122122121.title: Julie’s Realization

111311212.content:
WAIT!! Before we get back to the girls' story...it's time for a choice chapter. *sigh*

Are you digested by Julie's stomach acids, or do you somehow survive in this pit of death?
111311212.title: How Does This End For You?

choices: You start breaking down right away
Your digestion is really slow, get comfortable
1113112121.content:
*grrrrrrLOORRP*

You eventually tire out of punching the preteen girl's stomach walls, coming to the obvious and depressing understanding that nobody can hear your pitiful struggles over the oh-so-pleasant sounds of digestion. What is even in that lake of melting junk? Julie's still a little girl and yet it seems like her stomach is a bottomless pit...

Outside, Julie keeps shoveling snacks into her mouth and chatting with her friends while the movie plays. Her chewing while talking is messy, and super-quick; you begin to notice visible chunks of junk food plopping into the stomach acid as she's swallowing bits whole. Just like you! Only popcorn and chips can't get up and try to escape. Although that didn't really work out for you either, so yeah. You're basically a snack too.

Food for Julie...it has a nice ring to it. Maybe you could add this to some post-mortem résumé.

Suddenly, a wash of fizzy cola floods into the expanding gas chamber, pulling you with a whirlpool current into the thick of the mix as the liquid settles into the girl's belly.

*blorp* *grrrrn* *GLOOOORPP* *BLRP*

You felt small air bubbles popping around you, coming off of the surface of the settling soda, when suddenly Julie's whole stomach lurched and contracted.

"Hey, can you -- *UUAAARRP*" The preteen girl is caught by surprise as a big burp escapes her. All of the girls start cracking up, so just when you thought her stomach re-positioned itself after forcing that monstrosity of air out, now she is practically rolling with laughter.

"Can you pass the candy bowl?" Julie finally finishes her question, and an inverse dome of sweets is handed to her. Great. More food!

Julie unwraps a piece of chocolate and pops it into her mouth.

*GLK* *buuurp* A smaller belch blows out of the preteen's maw after swallowing her candy. Julie lifts up her top and pats her pale, flat, and most notably, packed belly. It gurgles contentedly in response.

You're still trapped snugly in her full tummy, watching your clothes dissolve and feeling a stinging, itchy sensation crawl over you. You're almost about to become little-girl-nutrients! Yay!
1113112121.title: Digestion begins

choices: Force yourself out the natural way
Worship Julie's belly and become devoted to her
11131121212.content:
*glllork* *slosh*

It's been about ten minutes since you were swallowed by Julie, but inside her stomach it feels like it's been an eternity. Right now you're nice and stuck in a thick, bubbly mass of digesting snacks and soda. Your clothes just finished melting right off of you, as you watched faintly (it's very dark in here) right before your eyes, leaving you completely naked. A fresh bit of meat for a growing young girl to metabolize and get some protein from. What a use of your life! It's not your getting out of here anyway...and she hates you...if she knew you were inside her she'd probably keep you as you are and do everything she could to make it even worse...might as well get it over with.

Wait...you apparently still have time to think about this...

...

"Oh man..." You mutter as you realize...

You're not digesting like the rest of her food.

Your body is resisting quite well. You don't even feel much of any pain yet.

Well congrats! You're going to be in Julie's stomach for a long, long time.

*GULP* *grrgl*

You trudge through the digestive slop just in time to avoid being covered in the preteen's latest chunk of chewed-up candy. It plops on top of the rest of its forsaken brethren with a sickening splatting, squlech-y sound. You can just barely see the mushy silhouette of it start to slowly sink and combine with the rest.

The whole scene kind of makes you want to puke, and you'd think you would and/or would have already given the humid stench permeating this junk food death cavern, but you find some sort of inner strength or whatever and keep yourself together. For now.

*GUUUUUURGGLLE*

Julie's stomach suddenly squeezes tightly, causing the upper half of your body to come in direct contact with the melty digested mess, and then immediately afterwards you feel a rush of bubbles and air fly past you in an upward draft. You feel weightless for but a second, like it was teasing a chance of you being lifted out.

"Oh my god, I can't freaking wait for -- *BUUOOORPP* *urrraaAAP*" Two booming airy belches escape Julie's bloated tummy out through her mouth in the middle of her talking and flood into the face of Carly sitting across from her.

In between her fit of laughter, Carly squeaked out, "Whatever's in there is not having a good time!"

Accurate read there Carly.

So this is your life now. Sit here and watch a preteen girl's food digest, struggle for air after she burps, her stomach fills back up again, and repeat.
11131121212.title: Your new home

111311212123.content:
You sit back and relax. Despite the smell, you have gotten used to it. Any clothes you were wearing were broken down by the acid. More food and soda drops in. You knew what you were now. The only thing you were was food to be digested by Julie. Despite what you thought, digestion didn't hurt at all. It actually felt pretty nice. You look down to see some of your skin going away though. You closed your eyes and listened. You could hear Julie's heartbeat. You also could hear the girls laughing. You decided to help the digestion by moving deeper into the stomach acids.
I'm going to be part of Julie. Amazing. You thought. After about an hour, you finally start to pass out. A lot of your skin has been eaten away. You look down to see that your feet are gone, you don't know when that happened. You slowly closed your eyes and go into a never-ending sleep. You say one more thing though.
"I hope you enjoyed your meal Julie."
111311212123.title: No more fighting Julie

choices: In a bag of gummy bears
11131122.content:
Suddenly, as you're about to follow your chewed-up mushy junk friends to a young girl's stomach acid, you hear a deep, rumbly noise echo from below you. You assume the guttural sound to be hunger growls from Julie's belly, but you also notice that your slow traveling to the back of her throat has stopped...

Julie sits up, placing a hand to her tummy. "Ugh, too much soda..."

"Yeah, no shit, you had like two and half cans already." Carly crudely and playfully comments.

As her left hand occupies itself with patting and caressing her temporarily bloated stomach, Julie's right comes up to her mouth. Following right along, the pre-teen girl lets out a loud, unwieldy burp. The bloating in her belly immediately dies down, as the air making her stomach stretched and full is forcefully expelled.

The good thing about not being chewed up, is that because of Julie's big burp, the blast of air picks up your intact body out of the mushy mass no problem, and sends it flying out of her mouth, back into the bedroom.

"And it begins..." Amanda announces, familiar with Julie's predisposition to belches that goes along with her love of carbonated drinks.

Julie laughs, and gulps down her mouthful finally. A small, residual *urp* comes up after the mushed and burped on snacks reach her stomach.

Whew. Almost was eaten there. Where do you land?
11131122.title: Unintentionally Saved

111311222.content: Although Julie burped facing the TV, your course through the air is changed by a sudden gust of wind, possibly her laying back down. You fly away from the girls' faces and their snacks, and instead land by someone's feet...
111311222.title: Near a girl's feet...somehow

choices: Her feet move around, and you're thrown back to her toes
1113112221.content:
Your body finally lands on the outstretched sole of Amanda's right foot. She is laying down with her feet kicking up, so you're still a ways off of the ground, but at least the landing was soft, in the pale flesh of your sister's gigantic foot. Her toes curl and wiggle, and you quickly realize that her big toe has roughly the surface area of your entire bedroom.

Taking short and careful steps, your own feet adjust to the squishy surface of the fleshy ground below you. It doesn't smell bad at all, to your surprise. Good on your sis for hygiene, but that really doesn't matter right now, does it? You continue towards her ankle, first climbing the hill that is the ball of her foot.

Suddenly...
1113112221.title: Your Sister's Feet

111312.content:
A pile of orange chips and the collection of cheese dust on your person let you know that you've landed in the one and only hand of your hungry sister. Amanda brings her next doomed handful to her mouth, and you feel her hot breath wash over you as her mouth salivates. The idea of rolling or jumping away crosses your mind, but for some reason your mind perceives that as being more dangerous, so you're scared to try.

Sister food or a scary fall...
111312.title: Brother-Flavored Doritos

choices: Digested by Amanda is the last way you want to go
1113122.content:
Your irrational fear of falling from this height betrays the very real terror of being eaten! Along with the handful of chips, you are shoved into your preteen sister's mouth. With a wet smack, your face meets her salivating tongue, as she begins to chew her snack into a more swallow-able mush.

As everything in her mouth gets tossed around, you desperately claw at her tongue to keep away from her crushing teeth, but unfortunately, you're thrown about like the rest of Amanda's snack. The sound of her loud chewing is deafening at your size, but miraculously, that's the extent of your experience being chewed; somehow you've only managed to be covered in chewed-up Doritos and saliva, and haven't been mashed into pieces.

Amanda is far too distracted by her friends and the movie to ever notice that there's a living moving piece of food in the mix with her Doritos, so after she's done chewing her snack all up, your helpless body, stuck in the pre-digested goop, is pushed into her throat with a loud, wet *GULP*.

You would scream if you didn't want to be immediately served food pre-chewed by your little sister. Slowly and steadily, you are rhythmically dragged further down the young girl's throat, until finally, you experience a short freefall sensation, followed quickly by a stinging hot splash into a shallow pool of...snacks and stomach acid.

Amanda's stomach. Where all food meets it cruel end...

info.brief_description: *Remake* You get shrunk by your sister and her friends. It can be fun or deadly.
info.description:
Your name is John (19) and your 16 yr old sister(Amanda)is having a sleep over. They shrink you and decide to have some fun. Her friends are typical teen girls who are full of energy, love junk food, and are sensitive about their bodies.

Amanda- Your sister; has long black hair, loves Doritos, and can burp real loud.

Carly- Her best friend; has a crush on you, and loves pizza.

Brianna- Large Girl; Will do anything the other girls tell her to do, is kind but can be very kinky

Julie- Hates you; Currently has a cold, and loves to drink soda

(Lolboy)

I personally felt there could have been more added, but there were too many chapters that ended abruptly, thus ending the fun early too. If the owner wants this to be taken down I will do so. In memory of the original, almost anything goes
info.pretty_title: Shrunk by Your Big Little Sister
